=====================================

## Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Service Contract for High Resolution Mass Spectrometer ID-X

#### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C068
* Reference Number: cb-514-69163020
* Amendment Number: 1
* Contracting Entity Name: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Desta Kissack
	+ Email: [desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca](mailto:desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (204) 583-8127
	+ Address: 4-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, MB R3C 3G7

#### Contract Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract to ThermoFisher Scientific (Mississauga) Inc. for the maintenance of a High Resolution Mass Spectrometer ID-X. The contract includes:

* All necessary parts, labor, and phone support for repairing the mass spectrometer as required
* One preventative maintenance call per year

#### Sole Source Justification

ThermoFisher Scientific owns the design of the equipment and is the only company that can provide parts, training, service, or repairs due to its proprietary technology.

#### Contract Period and Value

* Contract Period: One year from contract award with two (2) x one (1) year options to extend
* Estimated Value: $250,616.84 CAD (includes tax)

#### Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers who are authorized vendors and certified to maintain and repair ID-X Mass Spectrometers may submit a statement of capabilities to signal their interest in bidding. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

#### Closing Date and Time

The closing date and time for the submission of statements of capabilities is December 18, 2023 at 2:00 pm CST.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Suppliers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the following requirements:

* Be an authorized vendor certified to maintain and repair ID-X Mass Spectrometers

#### Contracting Authority

The Contracting Authority for the Contract is Desta Kissack, Senior Contracting Officer, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Western Service Centre, 4-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, MB R3C 3G7.
